summary: The year is 2012, the Summer Olympics are just around the corner, and here on the Nexus, Skyrim fans are preparing in their own fashion. A collection of all torch runners and their fantastic images.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/102225][IMG]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/439096-1340579894.png[/IMG][/url][/center][color=#CCCCCC][i][size=\"4\"][center]It all began with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/101600]LABTECH[/url] with his brilliant idea to start this wonderful relay. It has been carried on by all you see below. 

Now it\'s your turn! Upload your image and post a comment and a link in [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/709901-passing-the-torch]Passing The Torch[/url] and help this image gallery grow. Be sure to click on the images and give love to their creators:[/size][/center][/color][/i][line]

[center][i]All Images below are in version 2.0 to download[/i]
[/center]

[center][url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/709901-passing-the-torch][IMG] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/439096-1340575146.png[/IMG][/url][/center]


[size=\"3\"][color=#CCCCCC][i]For now the file only contains a few images. We are still working on getting permissions from everyone.

[u]Credits:[/u]
LABTECH For starting this off!
Yagho for his great headers!
Everyone else for continuing this!
